definitions.definition: The quality of agreeing or corresponding ; being suitable and appropriate .
A relation between two numbers indicating they give the same remainder when divided by some given number.
The quality of being isometric — roughly, the same measure and shape.
Matrix similarity by an orthogonal matrix .
Any equivalence relation defined on an algebraic structure which is preserved by operations defined by the structure.

main_definition: The quality of agreeing or corresponding ; being suitable and appropriate .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , number theory ) A relation between two numbers indicating they give the same remainder when divided by some given number.
( mathematics , geometry ) The quality of being isometric — roughly, the same measure and shape.
( mathematics , linear algebra ) Matrix similarity by an orthogonal matrix .
( universal algebra ) Any equivalence relation defined on an algebraic structure which is preserved by operations defined by the structure.
